title: Girl wounded by gunfire in Newport News
content:
NEWPORT NEWS
A girl was wounded by gunfire Monday night in the 3000 block of Williams St.
Officers were called about a shooting shortly before 11:30 p.m. and found the girl with a gunshot wound to her leg when they arrived, a police news release says. The wound was not considered life-threatening.
The girl, who was taken to a hospital, had been inside a home when she was shot.
Witnesses told police they saw a red “drop top” vehicle, the release says. Someone inside fired as the vehicle drove away.
Police had no other details and are asking anyone with information to call Crime Line at 1-888-LOCK-U-UP.
